attributes.action: Offer free self defense classes for females
attributes.additional_details: Because there are too many instances of attacks on women and it is expensive to learn any form of defense, with private classes starting at around £50 pcm and as far as I can see there are no free self defense courses available to adults
attributes.background: Would like an initiative to be started to encourage female self defense, similar to the be active initiative. Possibly subsidise the cost or offer discounts to woman to learn to defend themselves against men.
